name: Rolly's Castle Panic!
description:
Control Rolly and use his silly inflate mechanic to roll & bounce through a castle filled with puzzles and frenemies in Rolly's Castle Panic!

A light physics puzzle game I made during my first semester of Uni and my first game I ever made. It's buggy, poorly designed and was the concession of another more ambitious game mechanic I had no idea how to program at the time. I still am fond of it despite that.

Controls:

A/D: Move | S: Duck | Space: Jump | Hold Shift: Inflate

Made with these fine people:

Daniel Mckenzie: Music

Alison Huang @Drazillion : Level Design

Samantha Duffus: Art

Myself: Programming, Art + Animation
